channel.title: [PI] Ancient curse animations
channel.description: Hey, Guys..I Vain I, Since you help all the people [PI] based, i wanted to say, All the work you do is GREAT. I was wondering, do you know how to add the correct graphics for ancient curses? I don't know if i have the animations added already, i wondered if you could teach me...My anims are all dumb and messed up, and what not. - Isaiah
